## PointerAdaptorProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PointerAdaptorProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dampingFactor?](./controls.pointeradaptorprops.dampingfactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Damping value between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.5 |
|  [domElement?](./controls.pointeradaptorprops.domelement.md) | HTMLElement | <i>(Optional)</i> DOM element that should listen for pointer events. Defaults to <code>document.body</code> |
|  [multipointerThreshold?](./controls.pointeradaptorprops.multipointerthreshold.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Debounce for registering a change in the pointer count, in ms. Defaults to 100. |
|  [normalizeAroundZero?](./controls.pointeradaptorprops.normalizearoundzero.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> If values are normalized, whether they should be in -1 to 1 range. Defaults to true. |
|  [shouldNormalize?](./controls.pointeradaptorprops.shouldnormalize.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether to normalize the pointer position values. Defaults to true |
